documents.page_content: ·간편식은편의성에따라ReadytoEat(RTE), Ready to Heat(RTH), Ready to Cook(RTC), Ready to Prepare(RTP)의4가지로분류할수있음

구분정의주요품목
Ready to Eat(RTE) 즉석섭취식품별도의조리없이구입후 바로섭취가능한식품도시락,김밥,샌드위치, 샐러드,새싹채소
Ready to Heat(RTH) 즉석조리(완조리)식품단순가열을통해 섭취가능한식품즉석밥,즉석죽,
레토르트식품
Ready to Cook(RTC) 즉석조리(반조리)식품RTH에비해장시간가열이나 간단한조리가필요한식품냉동만두,냉동돈까스등일부 냉동식품및찌개류
Ready to Prepare(RTP)
신선편의식품식재료를요리하기편리하게 세정하고소분한상품밀키트(Meal Kit)
-NestleUSA社는,미국간편식시장에서가장큰점유율을차지하고있으며,Stouffer's(스토퍼스), DiGiorno(디지오르노), Tombstone(툼스톤), California Pizza Kitchen(캘리포니아피자키친), Jack's(잭스)등의브랜드를보유하고있음
-Kraft Heinz 社는, Kraft(크래프트), Oscar Mayer(오스카 마이어), Velveeta(벨비타)를주력브랜드로 가지고있으며,이외에도커피,과자,조미료,육가공품등다양한제품을판매하고있음
-ConAgra Foods 社는, Marie Callender's, Healthy Choice,Gardein등을주력브랜드로가지고있음
·영국은간편식이식품의범주에속하기때문에식품안전법규(FoodSafetyRegulations), 식품위생법규(Food Hygiene Regulations), 식품표시법규(Food Labelling Regulations), 식품취급법규(Food Handling Regulation)등을기본으로준수해야함
·유럽은대형유통회사들의자체브랜드로이루어져있음.유럽내주요기업으로는TescoPlc(테스 코), Marks & Spencer Plc(막스앤스펜서), Asda Group(아스다), SainsburyPlc(세인즈버리)등이있으 며,다양한제품군을확보하고있음
Method for preparing instant noodle, flour composition for instant noodle and use thereof
Method for producing instant fried noodles and frying treatment device
# Instant dried noodles and process for producing the same
# Method for producing a rice-based instant food product
# No bake granola product and methods of preparation
Cereal-based bar composition of the chewy type and method for preparing such a cereal-based bar composition
Ready-to-eat, gluten-free and ketogenic coconut meat-based cereal
Omega-3 enriched cereal, granola, and snack bars
-오메가3지방산중DHA(Docosahexaenoic acid), EPA(Eicosatetraenoic acid) 외SDA(tearidonic acid)도유익 한영양효과를가지는것으로연구되고있음
# Dried instant noodle and method for producing the same
# Method of making glazed baked snack food products and glaze for same
# Cooking of salt free or reduced salt breakfast cereals
Reduced sugar pre-sweetened breakfast cereals comprising triand tetra saccharides and methods of preparation
# Dried composition and food product containing the same
Method of processing oats to achieve oats with an increased avenanthramide content
# Meat products with increased levels of beneficial fatty acids
Process for improving shelf-life of fresh cut vegetables and food products produced thereby
# Oatmeal cereal product made from small oat groats and fines
# Food concentrate for soup, sauce or gravy
# Method of packaging cooked vegetable food products
# Method for preparing deep-frozen vegetables pieces
Production method for frozen noodles and composition for preventing freezer burn
# Method for manufacturing frozen cooked chinese noodles
Method and system for manufacturing frozen sushi that remains stable until consumption following thawing and refrigeration
